document.title: Appendix D: Curriculum Comparisons
document.abstract: Curriculum Comparisons listed by year and semester, includes 1945-46, 1965-66, 1985-86, and 1994-95.
document.publication-title: The ILR School at Fifty: Voices of the Faculty, Alumni and Friends

field.name: comments
field.value:
